before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"7g3lq","text":"Verify the stocks of all reagents and place an order or prepare solutions, if some reagents are running low.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"325ka","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

cited_protocols.title: MIBI: MIBI staining of fresh-frozen/OCT-embedded samples

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cnhkl","text":"This protocol entails the recommended staining procedure for Multiplex Ion Beam Imaging Time of Flight instrument (MIBI_TOF) as developed in the Sean C. Bendall and Michael R. Angelo labs, and has been adapted in the lab of Felix Hartmann specifically for the staining of fresh-frozen samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqo1m","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d29pp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63vau","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"align":"","authors":"Marc Bosse, Sean Bendall, Mike Angelo","can_edit":true,"date":0,"doi":"https://protocols.io/view/mibi-staining-b9b3r2qn","guid":"26D67740F49411EDB3327911D9A434A9","id":0,"journal":"protocols.io","protocol_id":62555,"title":"MIBI staining"}}}}

fork_info.title: MIBI: MIBI staining of FFPE samples

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"91l3v","text":"Staining tissue sections is fairly straightforward but there are few things to be cognizant of, when preparing samples:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c5o0j","text":"Always try to limit mechanical damage to the sample surface. This can occur when moving the samples with forceps, particularly when the mounting substrates are small.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"og6k","text":"Once the samples have been rehydrated, they cannot dry out until the end of the protocol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3u92n","text":"Be careful at all times to not touch the tissue, in order to not leave any residue.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"10s52","text":"Once the samples have been stained, fixed, and dehydrated, they have an indefinite shelf life and can be imaged at any time but need to be stored properly such as in a vacuum chamber or in a sealed vacuum bag","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bah89","text":"MIBI_TOF observes the basic principles of Mass spectrometry. Any contaminant ions present in water or in the air can potentially compromise the integrity of the sample.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bg73g","text":"Therefore to prevent potential contamination, it is important to always use single use lab ware containers to make the solutions. The protocol has been validated using the level of precision of graduated Nalgene bottles and 50 mL tubes. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":65,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3olnf","text":"The use of washed beakers or graduated cylinders is not considered as good a practice, due possible introduction of contaminants (exemples of sources: barium from lab ware soap or calcium from air dried lab ware)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":212}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

references.title: MIBI staining
references.authors: Marc Bosse, Sean Bendall, Mike Angelo

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ba3f1","text":"Verify stock of 1x PBS wash buffer and prepare accordingly if running low","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4q04","text":"This buffer does NOT contain Tween! {"blocks":[{"key":"p8h5","text":"Add 200µL of blocking buffer to the sequenza assembly, make sure the buffer is retained in the assembly (the waterline should stop at the upper end of the capillary space)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dovgm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2htu6","text":"Place the moist chamber at 4˚C  , preferably in a place with low disturbance","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cjo2t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"3CAAAD40AC2411EAA4481FEA64E85938","id":"78520","label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bogdf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6ocm","text":"Prepare fresh 2% glutaraldehyde fixing solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":47}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k1mb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pql8","text":"Glutaraldehyde fixing solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfcdb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cuhfp","text":"Add   of 1x PBS low barium in a 50 mL tube","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"df631","text":"Break the glass glutaraldehyde 8% (amber vial) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"315u","text":"Add the glutaraldehyde (10 mL) to the diluent by inverting it and tapping the bottom of the vial","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bja9u","text":"Transfer the content in a linear stainer container","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo9ce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"D5AC99208BD711EBB7D2AF08A94F3347","id":"86472","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tbnv","text":"Set the linear stainer containers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7cvh0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9m8aq","text":"Fill containers with the following solution and order","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ebnkl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ej555","text":"Glutaraldehyde x 1, PBS low barium x 1, TRIS 100 mm pH 8.5 x 3, ddH2O x 2, 70% Ethanol x1, 80% Ethanol x1, 95% Ethanol x 2, 100% Ethanol x 2, exit stainless steel tank = empty","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0h6i","text":"Mount the slides on the linear slide holder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29dgl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doagd","text":"Fix in 2% glutaraldehyde for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fgf1r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"B9C0F100C17711EAA61F7B8720B93867","id":"78522","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"15ugk","text":"Rinse briefly with 1x PBS low barium ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bj1n4","text":"Press on Menu ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bifai","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vbr1","text":"Check for Processing time = 30 sec, Lift bar = 976, Number of dips = 3 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bhdh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ai6k","text":"Continue to press Menu until the screen displays Start at: __","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fooi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"274sl","text":"Set Start position corresponding to the first slide carrier position ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34trc","text":"        ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u5ns","text":"Exemple: If the first slide carrier is at position 3, use Plus (+) or Minus (-) button to increase or decrease to get Start at: 03 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":64,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":118,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fve3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ci194","text":"Then press Enter ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dslh9","text":"Press Run on the Linear Stainer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2nu39","text":"Allow the dehydration process and wait until the slides reached the empty stainless steel tank and stop","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":68,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e883e","text":"Store the slides immediately under vacuum until MIBI acquisition","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"477d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"beijf","text":"Alternatively, the stained slides can be stored in a vacuum sealed bag for longterm storage pre and post MIBI acquisition","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ig98","text":"If using frozen and vacuumed slides (e.g. from collaborators), let slides come to room temperature before destroying the vacuum seal! (prevent condensation!) ~5-10min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":99,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":106,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvda3","text":"Prepare Blocking buffer (also used as antibody diluent in this protocol!)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brf1k","text":"This buffer does NOT contain Tween!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38iuu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sll6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ffr9a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2um20","text":"Filter with .45µm syringe","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["125","334"],"data":[["Reagents","Qty for 5mL"],["PBS 1x","4750µL"],["Horse Serum","250µL"]],"guid":"3268A2D0494611EDA8F6792C84010624","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"25cso","text":"Constituents of blocking buffer","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Qty for 5mL"],["PBS 1x","4750µL"],["Horse Serum","250µL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6o65","text":"Prepare 1x PBS by diluting 20xPBS 1:20 in Ultrapure type 1 water (needed for blocking buffer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3v3nc","text":"Fix Slides after thawing in 10% Neutral Buffered Formaline (NBF) for 1h at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66luk","text":"After washing, transfer slide into antigen retrieval buffer jar within the preheated PT module","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"angrl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ormu","text":"  ","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3s84a","text":"press run on the digital screen as soon as the device is preheated to 75°C. The display will show \"WARMUP\" and heat up to 80°C for retrieval, stay at this temperature for 20minutes, direcly put tissue back to RT.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":98,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g7ve","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhneg","text":"This process takes ~30min.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh370","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7E698BD063FF11ED84641701115E9D09","height":236.4418181818182,"id":373462,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"a9ffk\",\"text\":\"\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"fnc3bcqzf.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mny2bpk47.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mnyybpk47.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mnyzbpk47.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mnyxbpk47.webp","width":277.27718550106607}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"duq64","text":"In the morning: heat up PT Module and prepare fresh antigen retrieval solution (step 6) to place in the device for preheating","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cl5q","text":"To prepare fresh antigen retrieval solution, dilute 10x DAKO (3-in-1) pH9 antigen retrieval solution 1:10 in ultrapure (type 1) water (e.g. for 25mL: 2.5mL + 22.5mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"askgh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbcns","text":"note: if retrieving in gold slide delivery chamber (5 slots), 25mL are sufficient","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dlals","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"774pk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"50sla","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["141","205","146"],"data":[["Total volume (mL)","Volume target retrieval (mL)","Volume (mL) ddH2O"],["25","2.5","22.5"],["50","5","45"],["100","10","90"]],"guid":"8A7BDE1063FE11ED84641701115E9D09","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7kd76","text":"Dilution table for Dako Antigen retrieval solution","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Total volume (mL)","Volume target retrieval (mL)","Volume (mL) ddH2O"],["25","2.5","22.5"],["50","5","45"],["100","10","90"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a86j6","text":"Take slides out of the PT module and let them cool to room temperature (~10 min) before proceeding. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7t81n","text":"Fill a disposable Pipetting Reservoir with   of 1x PBS wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"56087D2A640011ED86F20A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93a8t","text":"Place sample slide on a Sequenza cover plate aligning the bottom slide with the notches on the cover plate (see picture below panel A)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a88m8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ck36","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ct4hb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"5BC3DAD1640011ED86F20A58A9FEAC02","height":362,"id":373466,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Sequenza1.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/jv6ibcqzf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mny4bcqzf.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mny3bcqzf.webp","width":541}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bo7kr","text":"Fill by capillarity the space between the slide and cover plate by holding the parts tight and dipping the bottom part of the assembly in the wash buffer reservoir (see picture above panel B). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ak5ns","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gbat","text":"If capillary force is not sufficient to fill the staining reservoir, a careful pumping motion on the triangular protrusion can help.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e08e5","text":"Transfer the slide and coverplate assembly into the Sequenza rack. Slip in the assembly (see below picture panel C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl06q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0i4u","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E81740E8640011ED86F20A58A9FEAC02","height":311,"id":373468,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Sequenza2.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/jv6kbcqzf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mny6bcqzf.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mny5bcqzf.webp","width":535}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qfhk","text":"Secure the assembly and make sure that the assembly placed down in the rack (see above picture panel D)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g2vv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53lmv","text":"Add   of wash buffer. The buffer should flow thru within 1 min 30 s. Repeat by adding 1 mL of wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3lftt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"F62C9B4C640011ED86F20A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h5tp","text":"Prepare the antibody mix according to the calculation. Make sure to spin down antibody vials before pipetting to prevent pipetting of aggregates. Use filter tips when pipetting from communal stocks and keep the tubes on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2l8st","text":"Disassemble the sequenza setup. Make sure at this point that the slide doesn't dry out and directly proceed to the next steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"37gs3","text":"If embedding medium is still on slide, carefully dip slide into 1x PBS before fixation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
